body:
When trying to build glib on my laptop (Fedora 24), I'm getting a core dump immediately after it starts make:

```
Fatal Python error: Py_Initialize: Unable to get the locale encoding
ImportError: No module named 'encodings'
Current thread 0x00007f87fe9ce700 (most recent call first):
../libtool: line 1766: 13376 Aborted                 (core dumped) dtrace -G -s glib_probes.d -fPIC -DPIC -o .libs/glib_probes.o
```

Any suggestions?
title: Core dump when trying to build glib
